com.poesys.db.dao

Class CacheMessageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.db.dao.CacheMessageListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, javax.jms.MessageListener

    public class CacheMessageListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, javax.jms.MessageListener
    A thread-based class that listens for messages about the Poesys/DB cache.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller
